name: BrucellosisTestsForBrucellaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Brucellosis (Tests for Brucella species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Brucella species Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Brucella species Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
